name: make_random_guess_bounds_and_diversity
docstring: Checks that make_random_guess stays in bounds and produces diverse values.

name: make_good_guess_test_cases
docstring: Ensures make_good_guess correctly returns the midpoint in several cases.

name: update_range_test_cases
docstring: Ensures update_range updates bounds correctly for higher, lower, correct, and invalid responses.

name: generate_secret_number_bounds_and_diversity
docstring: Checks that generate_secret_number stays in bounds and produces diverse values.

name: play_game_with_good_guesser_num_rounds
docstring: Ensures the good guesser never takes more than 7 guesses on [1,100].

name: play_game_with_random_guesser_num_rounds
docstring: Ensures the random guesser converges to an average between 7 and 8 guesses.

name: run_strategy_comparisons_converges_reasonably
docstring: Ensures run_strategy_comparisons gives plausible averages and shows good < random.
